constructor.details: Grants the governor address the DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE, GOVERNOR_ROLE, and GUARDIAN_ROLE

generateRole(uint8,address).details: Generates a unique role identifier based on the role name and target contract address

params.roleName: The name of the role (from ContractSpecificRoles enum)
params.roleTargetContract: The address of the contract the role is for

getRoleAdmin(bytes32).details: Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}.

params.account: The address to grant the role to
Address to grant the Commander role to
The account to which the role will be granted
params.roleName: The name of the role to grant
params.roleTargetContract: The address of the contract to grant the role for

params.account: The account to which the role will be granted
params.fleetCommanderAddress: The address of the fleet commander to grant the role for

params.account: The account to which the Decay Controller role will be granted
The account to which the Governor role will be granted
The account to which the Guardian role will be granted
The account to which the role will be granted
params.fleetCommanderAddress: The address of the fleet commander to grant the role for

grantRole(bytes32,address).details: Overrides the grantRole function from AccessControl to disable direct role granting.

params.account: The account to which the Super Keeper role will be granted

renounceRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `callerConfirmation`. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

params.account: The address to revoke the role from
Address to revoke the Commander role from
The account from which the role will be revoked
params.roleName: The name of the role to revoke
params.roleTargetContract: The address of the contract to revoke the role for
